TextLibrary.Text: Hrmph! You fight well for an outsider.
Hrmph! You fight well for an outsider.
Hrmph! You fight well for an outsider.
Hrmph! You fight well for an outsider.
Gee, thanks. Now, can I enter the Temple and talk with you?

Gee, thanks. Now, can I enter the Temple and talk with you?
Enter the Temple? No! You are unclean - I have told you this. You must first be purified if you wish to enter our Temple.
